name: Restless Battle
description:
Description:

Life has been hard... Fighting for survival since you were a child.
You learnt to wield the power of the fallen and adjust it to your will. 
Death tried to take you many times... and it will try even more. Life has cursed your for your twisted mind, now death shall try to collect you once more. However you are prepared.
Destroy enemies, get back from the dead, fight, fight and fight...

Controls: 
•Fireball - Hold Left click 
•Swing Sword - left click
•Move - WASD
